TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataParameter

summary.span: 代表 Command 物件的參數及 (選擇性) 其與 資料行的對應，而且是由存取資料來源的 .NET Framework 資料提供者所實作。

span.span: Represents a parameter to a Command object, and optionally, its mapping to columns; and is implemented by .NET Framework data providers that access data sources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面可讓繼承的類別來實作代表命令物件的參數的參數類別。The interface allows an inheriting class to implement a Parameter class, which represents a parameter to a Command object. 如需參數類別的詳細資訊，請參閱[設定參數和參數資料型別](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。For more information about Parameter classes, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md). 應用程式不會建立的執行個體介面直接，但是會建立繼承的類別的執行個體。An application does not create an instance of the interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits . 繼承的類別必須實作繼承的成員，和通常用來定義其他成員將提供者特有的功能。Classes that inherit must implement the inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality. 例如，介面會定義屬性。For example, the interface defines the property. 接著，類別會繼承這個屬性，而且也會定義屬性。In turn, the class inherits this property, and also defines the property. ## Examples 下列範例會建立衍生類別中的多個執行個體，到集合內。The following example creates multiple instances of the derived class, , through the collection within the . 這些參數可用來從資料來源選取資料，並將放在資料。These parameters are used to select data from the data source and place the data in the . 這個範例假設和已經建立具有適當的結構描述、 命令及連線。This example assumes that a and a have already been created with the appropriate schema, commands, and connection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlParameter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlParameter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.para:
若要升級.NET Framework 資料提供者之間的一致性，命名為繼承的類別，在表單中參數其中是提供給特定的.NET Framework 資料提供者命名空間中的所有類別的統一前置詞。例如，是前置詞類別命名空間。當您繼承自介面，您應該實作下列建構函式： 項目描述
PrvParameter() 初始化參數類別的新執行個體。
（字串名稱，PrvDbType 資料類型） 的 PrvParameter 初始化與參數名稱和資料類型的參數類別的新執行個體。
（字串名稱，物件的值） 的 PrvParameter 初始化參數名稱和參數的值物件的參數類別的新執行個體。
字串名稱、 PrvDbType 資料類型 (int 大小） PrvParameter 初始化參數名稱、 資料類型和寬度的參數類別的新執行個體。
（字串名稱、 PrvDbType 資料型別、 int 大小，字串 srcColumn） PrvParameter 初始化參數名稱、 資料類型、 寬度和來源資料行名稱的 DbParameter 類別的新執行個體。
（字串參數名稱、 PrvDbType dbType、 int 大小、 ParameterDirection 方向、 布林 isNullable、 位元組精確度、 位元組的小數位數、 字串 srcColumn、 DataRowVersion srcVersion、 物件的值） 的 PrvParameter 初始化新執行個體與參數名稱、 資料類型、 寬度、 來源資料行名稱、 參數方向、 數值有效位數，以及其他屬性的類別。

To promote consistency among .NET Framework data providers, name the inheriting class in the form Parameter where is the uniform prefix given to all classes in a specific .NET Framework data provider namespace. For example, is the prefix of the class in the namespace. When you inherit from the interface, you should implement the following constructors: Item Description
PrvParameter() Initializes a new instance of the Parameter class.
PrvParameter(string name, PrvDbType dataType) Initializes a new instance of the Parameter class with the parameter name and data type.
PrvParameter(string name, object value) Initializes a new instance of the Parameter class with the parameter name and an object that is the value of the Parameter.
PrvParameter(string name, PrvDbType dataType, int size) Initializes a new instance of the Parameter class with the parameter name, data type, and width.
PrvParameter(string name, PrvDbType dataType, int size, string srcColumn) Initializes a new instance of the DbParameter class with the parameter name, data type, width, and source column name.
PrvParameter(string parameterName, PrvDbType dbType, int size, ParameterDirection direction, Boolean isNullable, Byte precision, Byte scale, string srcColumn, DataRowVersion srcVersion, object value) Initializes a new instance of the class with the parameter name, data type, width, source column name, parameter direction, numeric precision, and other properties.

member this.DbType : System.Data.DbType with get, set

One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks （Prv 代表提供者專屬的前置詞） PrvDbType 和連結。The PrvDbType (where Prv represents the provider-specific prefix) and are linked. 因此，設定PrvDbType 變為支援 PrvDbType。Therefore, setting the changes the PrvDbType to a supporting PrvDbType. 如需支援的資料類型的清單，請參閱適當的.NET Framework 資料提供者 PrvDbType 成員。For a list of the supported data types, see the appropriate .NET Framework data provider PrvDbType member. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[DataAdapter 的參數](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)。For more information, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md).

exception.span: 屬性並未設定為有效的 。

span.span: The property was not set to a valid .

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示參數是僅限輸入、僅限輸出、雙向或預存程序傳回值參數。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the parameter is input-only, output-only, bidirectional, or a stored procedure return value parameter.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是輸出，以及執行相關聯的沒有傳回值，包含 null 值。If the is output, and execution of the associated does not return a value, the contains a null value. 讀取的最後一個結果集的最後一個資料列之後， `Output`， `InputOut`，和`ReturnValue`參數會更新。After the last row from the last resultset is read, `Output`, `InputOut`, and `ReturnValue` parameters are updated. ## Examples 下列範例會建立實作類別的執行個體，並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates an instance of the implementing class, , and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlParameter.Direction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter.Direction Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlParameter.Direction Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter.Direction Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性供期間以判斷原始或目前的值是否用於參數值。This property is used by the during the to determine whether the original or current value is used for a parameter value. 這可讓更新主索引鍵。This allows primary keys to be updated. 這個屬性會忽略和。This property is ignored by the and . 此屬性設定為版本供屬性，或方法物件。This property is set to the version of the used by the property, or the method of the object. ## Examples 下列範例會建立實作類別的執行個體，並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates an instance of the implementing class, , and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlParameter.SourceVersion Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter.SourceVersion Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlParameter.SourceVersion Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter.SourceVersion Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Value { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.Value : obj with get, set

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the parameter.
An that is the value of the parameter.
The default value is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 輸入參數的值繫結至傳送到伺服器。For input parameters, the value is bound to the that is sent to the server. 輸出和傳回值參數，在完成設定值及之後已關閉。For output and return value parameters, the value is set on completion of the and after the is closed. 將 null 參數值傳送給伺服器，使用者還必須指定`DBNull`、 不是 null。When sending a null parameter value to the server, the user must specify `DBNull`, not null. 系統中的 Null 值是沒有值的空物件。The null value in the system is an empty object that has no value. `DBNull` 用於表示 null 值。`DBNull` is used to represent null values. 如果應用程式指定的資料庫型別，繫結的值會轉換成該類型，提供者將資料傳送到伺服器時。If the application specifies the database type, the bound value is converted to that type when the provider sends the data to the server. 提供者會嘗試將任何類型的值，如果支援介面。The provider attempts to convert any type of value if it supports the interface. 如果指定的型別不相容的值，可能導致轉換錯誤。Conversion errors may result if the specified type is not compatible with the value. 屬性覆寫。The property is overwritten by . ## Examples 下列範例會建立實作類別的執行個體，並設定其屬性的某些。The following example creates an instance of the implementing class, , and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlParameter.Value Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter.Value Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlParameter.Value Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter.Value Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
